compatibility.notes: TTYP0 is a permissive license, allowing for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Retain the copyright notice and permission notice in all copies.
Rename modified fonts according to the specified conditions.
license.name: TTYP0
obligations: Include the copyright notice, permission notice, and disclaimer in all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
Rename fonts if glyphs are modified or additional glyphs are added, ensuring the new names do not contain 'UW' and may contain 'ttyp0' only if preceded by a different foundry name.
